dragDrop.title: Drop files here to create File Nodes
dragDrop.subtitle: Supports documents, images, archives, code files, and more

errors.uploadFailed: Upload failed. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds 50MB limit. Please choose a smaller file.
errors.unsupportedType: File type not supported. Supported types: Documents, Images, Archives, Code, Data, Text, Spreadsheets, Presentations.
errors.mediaFilesBlocked: Media files (video/audio) are not supported. Please upload documents, images, or other supported file types.
errors.networkError: Network connection lost. Upload will resume automatically when connection is restored.
